page.title: 11ANNE'S SHOP.
page.content: Anne's Shop is 16 years old it is the only shop in Clavering Estate and it is not very big. I go on the way to school every morning and every dinner time.I always get a ripple bar and some bubblies.They have more sweets than all the meat and tins.The meat is under the counter and the beer is behind the counter. The fruit and vegtables are at the front of the shop they have a rack with the papers and magazines on. They got new cupboards in and put all their crisps under there. They sell bread, teacakes, creamcakes, cigarettes and ice lollies. Every night some kids get newspapers out of Anne's and deliver them round the estate. At the end of the week they get Â£3.50 for delivering them on nights and if they do mornings and nights they get Â£6.50.
